mapper.select: select * from board_info order by board_num desc, board_date desc

SELECT b.board_num ,b.board_writer_num ,b.board_title ,b.board_content ,b.board_img ,b.board_date ,u.user_num ,u.nickname ,u.ilju FROM board_info b , user_info u WHERE b.board_num=#{board_num} AND b.board_writer_num=u.user_num

SELECT A.CM_NUM ,A.BOARD_NUM ,A.CM_CONTENT ,A.CM_USER_NUM ,A.CM_RECOMMENT_NUM ,TO_CHAR(A.CM_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CM_DATE
,B.USER_NUM ,B.USER_ID ,B.NICKNAME ,B.NAME ,B.USER_IMG
FROM COMMENT_INFO A INNER JOIN USER_INFO B ON A.CM_USER_NUM = B.USER_NUM
WHERE A.BOARD_NUM = #{board_num} AND CM_RECOMMENT_NUM IS NULL ORDER BY A.CM_NUM DESC

SELECT A.CM_NUM ,A.BOARD_NUM ,A.CM_CONTENT ,A.CM_USER_NUM ,A.CM_RECOMMENT_NUM ,TO_CHAR(A.CM_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CM_DATE
,B.USER_NUM ,B.USER_ID ,B.NICKNAME ,B.NAME ,B.USER_IMG
FROM COMMENT_INFO A INNER JOIN USER_INFO B ON A.CM_USER_NUM = B.USER_NUM
WHERE A.BOARD_NUM = #{board_num} AND CM_RECOMMENT_NUM IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY A.CM_NUM DESC
mapper.update: update comment_info set cm_content=#{cm_content} where cm_num=#{cm_num}
